${ModID}:Rummage.NAME: Rummage Alternate
${ModID}:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of the highest-cost card in hand by 1 this turn.
${ModID}:Rummage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of the !M! highest-cost cards in hand by 1 this turn.

${ModID}:Rummage2.NAME: Rummage
${ModID}:Rummage2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card and reduce its cost by !M! this turn.

${ModID}:Cardistry.NAME: Cardistry
${ModID}:Cardistry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next card you play this turn is returned to the top of your draw pile.
